descriptions: Expanded Animation Library: We've added 30 new synced animations, bringing more dynamic and coordinated actions to your experience.
Fortnite Animation Pack: Enjoy 60 free Fortnite-inspired animations, perfect for adding unique flair.
Weapon Style Persistence: Resolved an issue where weapon styles would incorrectly persist even after switching to a weapon not configured in `config.weapons`.
Invisible Weapon Fix: Fixed a bug that caused weapons to become invisible while facing a gun.

Idle Animation Conflict Resolution: Addressed conflicts between idle and laying down animations. You can now also define custom `blockedAnims` for idle animations in `src/resource/client/modules/idle.lua`.
